article:
Do you know Mr. King? He and his wife work in the _ office. She works harder than he does and so she is the  _ of their office. The man has to listen to  her. But when they get home, the woman always feels _ and doesn't want to do anything. So the man does _ of the housework. He does the cooking, washing and cleaning. And their children think his _ is delicious.
It's Saturday today and they don't go to work. Mrs. King _  some friends to dinner. Now they're talking in the sitting room. Mr. King is busy in the kitchen. They say he's a  _ cook, too. This makes the man feel _ .
" I'm abler   than her," said Mr. King, "but her spouse   is abler than  _ !"
